channel.title: Help
channel.description: I've been trying to get help with my webclient and my server for a while now. I solved most of my problems :D. Now the problem I have now is that my webclient doesn't connect to my server IP and for some reason people can't login to my server when they logout or when I restart server. It like blocks them, it says "error connecting". So if you could help me that would be great. I have a 317 delta base. And I have the 1 connection per ip added.

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @sageofmali sageofmali
item.description:
@sageofmali wrote:

Lol, I’m not a poor noob coder. I can’t find a way to fix these two problems.

Read full topic

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @lord_fear lord_fear
item.description:
@lord_fear wrote:

Try re-adding it,
Make sure you follow a tutorial if you are new to Private servers/JAVA
And if you find yourself with the same error, Then make sure it is enabled to allow only “1” connection per ip.
If further problems arise, then PM me and i will help you a soon as i can.

Read full topic

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @sageofmali sageofmali
item.description:
@sageofmali wrote:

Lol, I’ve had my server up for a while. I disabled the 1 ip per computer and it stopped that, but I want the 1 ip back.

Read full topic

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @lord_fear lord_fear
item.description:
@lord_fear wrote:

  1. Make sure that the ip address is ‘correct’
  2. Make sure that there is no signlink$1.class or client$1.class or gui$1.class
  3. Make sure that the 1 connection per ip is correct, You may have made it so that no-one can connect to the ip address.
  4. Port Forward?

Read full topic

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @sageofmali sageofmali
item.description:
@sageofmali wrote:

I’ve been trying to get help with my webclient and my server for a while now. I solved most of my problems :D. Now the problem I have now is that my webclient doesn’t connect to my server IP and for some reason people can’t login to my server when they logout or when I restart server. It like blocks them, it says “error connecting”. So if you could help me that would be great. I have a 317 delta base. And I have the 1 connection per ip added.

Read full topic
